variable.name: PLATE_ID
variable.comment: Character field Blank = Field not filled in. Non-blank = Field filled in.

variable.name: PPBP_I
variable.description: Indicator variable for pro-platelet basic protein (PPBP)
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: BIKUNIN_I
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: PPBP
variable.comment: The lower detectable limit for PPBP is 6.38E+04 pg/mL and the upper detectable limit is 3.10E+08 pg/mL. PPBP values below or above these limits were set to the lower or upper detectable limit respectively. Use PPBP_I to see what records are below and above these limits. PPBP values were set to unknown if PPBP_CV was greater than or equal to 39.1 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 30.1 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: PPBP_CV
variable.comment: PPBP_CV values were set to unknown if PPBP_CV was greater than or equal to 39.1 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 30.1 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: BIKUNIN
variable.comment: The lower detectable limit for BIKUNIN is 6.47E+05 pg/mL and the upper detectable limit is 3.19E+09 pg/mL. BIKUNIN values below or above these limits were set to the lower or upper detectable limit respectively. Use BIKUNIN_I to see what records are below and above these limits. BIKUNIN values were set to unknown if BIKUNIN_CV was greater than or equal to 37.3 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 27.4 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: BIKUNIN_CV
variable.comment: BIKUNIN_CV values were set to unknown if BIKUNIN_CV was greater than or equal to 37.3 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 27.4 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: RUN_DATE
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.
